alert.note: Alert for Dickson; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued March 31 at 10:56PM CDT until March 31 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Dickson County in Middle Tennessee... South central Montgomery County in Middle Tennessee... Southern Houston County in Middle Tennessee... Northern Humphreys County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1055 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 5 miles north of Waverly, moving east at 50 mph. A second severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 5 miles northwest of New Johnsonville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Dickson, Waverly, Camden, Erin, New Johnsonville, McEwen, Charlotte, Vanleer and Slayden. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: Tornadoes are extremely difficult to see and confirm at night. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
